entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
